settings.richtext: Forgano was born for women who believe there is no finish line to their potential
settings.richtext2: No matter where you are on your journey, our brand exists to help you find your confidence, and make it permanent. Starting from the ground up. We were founded on the belief that miracle workers deserve miraculous footwear. And nothing less.

settings.richtext: It is our passion for creativity, design, and the fearlessness to push the boundaries
settings.richtext2: So we birthed a shoe that serves to be the ultimate package: comfort, function, versatility and style. Made with soft, eco-friendly materials, we invite you to slip into something more comfortable, whether its for streets or the clinic.

settings.richtext:
We believe a better you = better
patient care. So we never lose sight of our ultimate mission:

To encourage women in healthcare to live well-balanced lifestyles of health, beauty, and slaying their profession.

settings.h3: Forgano was founded by Eunsook Choi, a 13 year rockstar RN from Miami, FL. She noticed how often her coworkers had to replace their shoes, in an unending struggle to find that perfect pair.
settings.h32: Inspired by her mother, a fashion entrepreneur in South Korea, Eunsook set out to energize the healthcare industry by bringing out exceptionally comfortable all-around footwear, with the desire to help women in medicine look and feel amazing.
